comments.html: Thank you! I was hoping for something better, though 🤦‍♂️
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: Most switches I have seen through the years, when they do not have a configuration, start with all ports active and in the same VLAN (the default VLAN with ID 1). Notable exceptions were Dell OS9 and Cisco Catalyst 6500 starting with all ports disabled and in L3 mode.
comments.name: Erik Auerswald
